snippet: Few investors may have noticed, but every day in 2012, and in the early days of 2013, the S.& P. 500 has closed in positive territory for the calendar year.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column points out that though few investors may have noticed, every day in 2012, and in early days of 2013, S& P 500 has closed in positive territory for calendar year, which has only happened in eight other years since 1928; holds that in spite of performance, many people do not see market as worth the bother.
lead_paragraph: Few investors may have noticed, but every day in 2012, and in the early days of 2013, the S.& P. 500 has closed in positive territory for the calendar year.

headline.print_headline: A Stock Market Streak That Has Drawn Few Cheers
headline.seo: A Stock Market Winning Streak Has Drawn Few Cheers
headline.main: A Stock Market Streak That Has Drawn Few Cheers
